website_summaries.verdict: This auto-shop quality transmission jack boasts a 2-stage lift system that hits an impressive maximum height of 76.5 inches.
pros: Foot pedal rapidly raises mounting head, thanks to air-assist
Hand-pump hydraulic secondary stage for more exact operator control
Easy-grip knobs make it simple to adjust mounting head
Wide leg base with 4-inch polyurethane swivel wheels
Maximum forward tilt 42 degrees, 46 degrees back
cons: Hydraulic fluid may leak from time to time, so be sure to check levels

customer_reviews.title: Need to improve.
customer_reviews.text: Need to improve top part of jack. Too much hassle to wrap around the transmission to scure on to jack. Chain is keep falling out of hooks. Hard to scure. It's not the best for transmission shop.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Park

customer_reviews.title: I have had this transmission jack 18 months and it ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had this transmission jack 18 months and it will not stay up, bleeds off instantly which is very dangerous. I was told by amazon to contact manufacturer which I will do to see if they will send parts to repair.
customer_reviews.author: mydevil

customer_reviews.title: Performs Very Well
customer_reviews.text: We own an auto repair shop and one of our big draws is rebuilding transmissions. Consequently, we do a lot of them! This jack has made that process a lot easier and safer. One of the best parts is the height it reaches. I'm rather tall so my vehicles are on the lift fairly high. My old jack would not go up this high so this has been a huge plus. Would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Great jack.
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for a while in a single tech shop. Works great. Really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: kyle west

customer_reviews.title: An excellent jack for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this through Amazon. Besides being 100.00 cheaper at Amazon, the jack is top notch. I did make a modification to it which is why it only got 4 stars instead of 5. I installed swivel brackets from my floor trans jack instead of the rails they give you which in my opinion are totally worthless. Transmissions come in all sizes and shapes. The swivel brackets are featured on the higher end jacks costing more. They should also be on this jack. Other than that the jack is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: hevster

customer_reviews.title: Great Jack for the money so far.
customer_reviews.text: We like the way it works. Easy to use. Nice height on first stage, and 2nd moves fast with the hand pump.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: This jack has been one of the most useful purchases that I've made in a long time. I use it for transmissions and handling fuel tanks. The only downside is that it's made in China...
customer_reviews.author: 3blkcats

customer_reviews.title: Excellent piece of equipment
customer_reviews.text: For the money, this jack cannot be beat. It handles eveything from light duty to heavy duty trucks and more.
customer_reviews.author: Albany Dodge

customer_reviews.title: OTC(Ohio Tool Co) or CTC (China Tool Co)
customer_reviews.text: I am totally fed up with paying good american earned money on China junk.I dont care how good you say the product is its china junk.I am also am disappointed with the same American companies that farm out for cheaper manufacturers.
customer_reviews.author: Ted

customer_reviews.title: Worst pump I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy it. I have bought it for my shop. It did not last from the very first start. I tried to call otc, to only get photos and instructions in chines. That should tell you enough. Don't waste your time.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: garbage
customer_reviews.text: the air half of the jack does not do a good job at holding the weight. When you let it down it comes down 3 inches at a time, then pauses and then another 3 inches, then pauses, etc. it is not a very smooth operation.
customer_reviews.author: Rich Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, good design and features, works well in my commercial shop
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: OTC 1794A 1000 lbs Capacity Air-Assisted High-Lift Transmission Jack
product_meta.description: OTC Air-Assisted 1,000 pounds capacity High-Lift Transmission Jack Air-assist primary stage for rapidly raising the mounting head, activated by depressing foot pedal. The hydraulic secondary stage for precise operator control, activated by a hand pump to raise the load, and a release knob to lower the load. The big, easy-to-grip knobs that make mounting head adjustments simple, and a safety chain for securing the load. Its wide leg base with 4 inch polyurethane swivel wheels that provide stability and easy maneuvering. (Brakes on two of the wheels.) its safety overload system to prevent jack from being used beyond its rated capacity. It features 1,000 pounds maximum load capacity, 37-5/8 inch low position overall height, 76-1/2 inch maximum height, maximum tilt 42 degree forward and 46 degree backward, Maximum side tilt of + or - 12 degrees, and a leg width of 37-1/8 inch.
feature_bullets: Air-assist primary stage for rapidly raising the mounting head activated by depressing foot pedal
Hydraulic secondary stage for precise operator control activated by a hand pump to raise the load and a release knob to lower the load
Big easy-to-grip knobs that make mounting head adjustments simple and a safety chain for securing the load
Wide leg base with 4 inch polyurethane swivel wheels that provide stability and easy maneuvering
20-Ton capacity jack with a maximum extension of 17-1/2 inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars15 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
